search.query: | rest /services/data/summaries data_model_acceleration=1 | stats count by search_head_guid, name | lookup fb_services_server_info_cache guid AS search_head_guid OUTPUT serverName | lookup fb_services_server_info_cache captain AS search_head_guid OUTPUT serverName AS shc_peer | eval server_alt=case(isnotnull(shc_peer), mvindex(shc_peer, 0) . " (SHC)", isnull(serverName), "Unpeered", 1=1, serverName) | eval shead=search_head_guid . " (" . server_alt . ")"
| stats count values(search_head_guid) AS search_head_guid by shead
search search_head_guid=$srv$ | stats count by name
| rest /services/data/summaries data_model_acceleration=1 | search search_head_guid=$srv$ title=$dm_full_name$ | eval related=split(related_indexes, ",")
| loadjob $selector_sid$ | search search_head_guid=$srv|s$ | eval serverName=if(isnotnull(shc_peer), mvindex(shc_peer, random() % mvcount(shc_peer)), serverName) | fields serverName
| rest /servicesNS/-/-/data/models splunk_server=$srv_name$ | eval full_name="DM_" . 'eai:acl.app' . "_" . title | search full_name=$dm_full_name$
eval now=now(), atime=if('acceleration.earliest_time' = 0, 0, relative_time(now(), 'acceleration.earliest_time')) | eval acceleration_secs=now - atime

stats count by related, splunk_server | lookup fb_services_data_indexes_cache splunk_server, title AS related OUTPUT frozenTimePeriodInSecs | stats max(frozenTimePeriodInSecs) AS frozenTimePeriodInSecs by related | rename related AS "Indexes", frozenTimePeriodInSecs AS "Freeze Cutoff (sec)"

chart.title: Disk Usage / Bucket Count by Indexer

search.query: stats sum(total_bucket_count) AS count, sum(total_size) AS size by splunk_server | rename splunk_server AS Indexer

table.title: These are the volumes identified by tstatsHomePath (wants serverName)

search.query: | loadjob $data_summaries_sid$ | stats count by related | fields related | rename related AS title | join type=left title [| rest /services/data/indexes splunk_server=$srv_name$ | rex field=tstatsHomePath "volume:(?<volume_name>[^/\\\\]+)" | stats count by volume_name, title ] | table title, volume_name | rename title AS "Related Index", volume_name AS "Volume Used"

table.title: This is the output from index-volumes (wants serverName)

search.query: | rest /services/server/status/partitions-space splunk_server=* | search [| loadjob $data_summaries_sid$ | fields splunk_server ] | fields splunk_server, mount_point, available, capacity | eval UsePct=round((capacity - available) * 100 / capacity, 1) | rename capacity AS Size, available AS Avail | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(Size)` | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(Avail)` | rename mount_point AS MountedOn | table splunk_server, MountedOn, Size, Avail, UsePct | sort MountedOn
